## Load Packages

```{r}
#| message: false
#| warning: false

library(DBI)
library(dplyr)
library(pins)
library(duckdb)
library(dbplyr)
```

## Connect to Data

```{r}
# Make ODBC connection once it's fixed in test drive
#  https://github.com/rstudio/evaluations/issues/402
con <- dbConnect(duckdb::duckdb(), dbdir = "/data/duckdb/database/demo-datasets.db")

# Check available datasets in DuckDB
dbListTables(con)
```

## Data Transformation

```{r}
#| warning: false

covid <- tbl(con, "covid") |> 
  # Make a filter in DB
  filter(province_state == "Maryland") |> 
  # Read into memory
  collect()
```

## Pin Data to Posit Connect

```{r}
board <- pins::board_connect()
pins::pin_write(board = board, x = covid, name = "publisher1/covid_data", type = "csv")
```
